Package com.brightywe.brightylist.email.service

Class EmailSendingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightywe.brightylist.email.service.EmailSendingService
  • @Service
public class EmailSendingService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class EmailSendingService for managing e-Mail sending via The Twilio SendGrid.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EmailSendingService()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void actionEmailSent​(EmailDetails email)
      increases email_daily_count for current day, deletes email from database
      void actionFailedToSend​(EmailDetails email)
      increases failure_count for EmailDetails email
      void addDailyCount​(EmailDailyCount emailDailyCount)
      Increases emailDailyCount by one and saves it in databese.
      void addEmailToQueue​(Task task, Reminder reminder, java.time.LocalDateTime now)
      Creates EmailQueue object from task and reminder, saves it in databese table email_queue.
      void addOverdueEmailToQueue​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​java.util.List<TaskDto>> taskMap)
      Creates List of OverdueEmailQueue objects from overdue tasks, saves it in databese table overdue_email_queue.
      com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.Mail createMail​(EmailDetails email)
      Creates e-Mail to be sent from EmailDetails
      com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.Mail createResetPasswordMail​(PasswordResetToken passwordResetToken)
      Creates e-Mail with reset password link to be sent to the user.
      void deleteEmailQueue​(EmailDetails email)
      Deletes email wich is instance of EmailDetails from proper table from databese.
      void getDailyCount()
      Setting value of variable emailDailyCount from databese for curent day if present, otherwise creates new enty in database and initialize emailDailyCount = 0.
      java.lang.String getUserEmailByTask​(Task task)
      Returns user email of user by task.
      java.lang.String getUserEmailByUserId​(java.lang.Long userId)
      Returns user email of user by userId.
      void saveDailyCount​(EmailDailyCount emailDailyCount)
      Saves emailDailyCount in databese.
      void sendEmail​(EmailDetails email, java.lang.Long resentLimit)
      Send e-Mail with respect to EMAIL_DAILY_LIMIT
      void sendEmailsQueued()
      Sends all e-Mail stored in email_queue database table, with respect to EMAIL_DAILY_LIMIT and EMAIL_RESENT_LIMIT
      boolean sendEmailViaSendGrid​(com.sendgrid.helpers.mail.Mail email)
      Sends e-Mail via The Twilio SendGrid, on succes increases email_daily_count for current day
      boolean sendMailViaSendGrid​(EmailDetails email)
      Sends e-Mail via The Twilio SendGrid, on succes increases email_daily_count for current day, on failure increases failure_count for EmailDetails email
      void sendOverdueEmailsQueued()
      Sends all e-Mail stored in email_queue database table, with respect to EMAIL_DAILY_LIMIT and OVERDUE_EMAIL_RESENT_LIMIT
      boolean sendResetPasswordEmail​(PasswordResetToken passwordResetToken)
      Send e-Mail with password reset link to the user with respect to EMAIL_DAILY_LIMIT
      void updateEmailQueue​(EmailDetails email)
      Updates email wich is instance of EmailDetails from proper table from databese.
